simergy.core.system

Class SimErgy

  • java.lang.Object
    • simergy.core.system.SimErgy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SimErgy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Class SimErgy. This class represents the system running during a simulation and during the use of the CLUI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
